snippet.title: Story-driven Survival / Farm Sim - Veil of Dust: A Homesteading Game story trailer
snippet.description:
Play the demo/ Wishlist on steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1593170/Veil_of_Dust_A_Homesteading_Game/ | Join us on discord:
__________________________________________________

Veil of Dust is a story-driven Survival/ Farm RPG about learning to live after loss. Craft tools, food & homestead upgrades. Build relationships & discover a mysterious world beyond the veil. Survive the sparse desert environment by farming, foraging, hunting, fighting and exploring a historical 1860's frontier while unraveling a story about love & tenacity. 

_________________________________________________

#FarmRPG #Survival #Trailer #VisualNovel #LostInBlue #HarvestMoon #StardewValley #RuneFactory #Trailer #IndieGames
